title: Fake riot email?
body: I recieved an email from accounts@riot.com asking me to verify my account i thought i did this when i started i havent done anything im just wondering if this is a fake

replies.body: It sounds like you may have received a phishing email.  It's important to be wary of suspicious emails, and I'm glad you checked first!  To know for sure, our [Emails From Riot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751784-Emails-from-Riot-Games) guide can help clarify legitimate emails vs malicious ones.  I hope that helps!
